articles.title: IDBI Bank revises FD rates: These investors can get 7.55% on 300-day fixed deposit tenure - The Economic Times
articles.description: IDBI Bank FD rates: IDBI Bank provides interest rates ranging from 3% to 7% on FDs maturing in seven days to five years to regular clients, and 3.5% to 7.5% to the senior citizens on callable deposits for amounts below Rs 2 crore.
